snippet: Donald J. Trump shows contempt for the First Amendment, separation of powers and the rule of law, scholars across the political spectrum say.
abstract: Legal experts warn that Donald J Trump poses threat to United States Constitution and legal system itself should he be elected and fulfill some of his campaign promises; cite his declarations that he would make it easier to sue journalists and news organizations for libel, bar Muslims from entering country and threaten to harm law-abiding demonstrators.

byline.contributor: Jennifer Steinhauer contributed reporting from Tucson.

lead_paragraph: Donald J. Trump shows contempt for the First Amendment, separation of powers and the rule of law, scholars across the political spectrum say.

headline.main: Donald Trump Could Threaten U.S. Rule of Law, Scholars Say
headline.print_headline: Trump Declarations Seen as Threat to Rule of Law
